nodes.text: Jaybo Hood was a ten-year-old human male who lived on the planet Iego during the Clone Wars. He was a mechanic who tinkered with Separatist battle droids and made them into his own army of personal servants. When Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker found themselves trapped by a LaserWeb Defense Station on Iego, Hood used his skills to assist them in escaping unharmed.
Jaybo Hood first appeared in the episode "Mystery of a Thousand Moons" from the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. He was voiced by David Kaufman.
